pageContext.description: Socketed celt, looped, cast with 'wing' ridges but no line for ... ridge; Dummy ... cast in collar on both sides at right angles to loop; Cutting edge broken on side away from loop
pageContext.other: under site notes: "found by workman digging for flints! 1890" and at top right corner "B.Gr.1" notation
pageContext.publications: Victoria County History, Surrey; Vol 1, p. 241 plate face p. 241; proceedings of the Society of Antiquarians of London Sec 2, 18, p. 285 elseg
pageContext.collection: B. Gr. 1; Croydon Natural History Soc; Eldon House 2 Lansdown Rd; Croydon, Surrey
pageContext.remarks: Badly cast; Many small surface pits from damp mould
